MicroQuickJS WASM

Original by Fabrice Bellard | WASM port by Claude Code

Minimal JavaScript Engine in WebAssembly

MicroQuickJS is a JavaScript engine designed for embedded systems, now running in your browser via WebAssembly. It supports a subset of JavaScript close to ES5 with some modern extensions.

118 KB WASM Size
1 MB JS Memory
- ms Last Exec

This entire WASM port, demo page, and deployment was created by Claude Code (claude.ai/code) with zero human code review or modification. The original MicroQuickJS engine is by Fabrice Bellard and Charlie Gordon.
